animals.name: Tiger
animals.funFact: Tigers have striped skin, not just striped fur.

animals.name: Monkey
animals.funFact: Some monkeys use tools like rocks to open food.

animals.funFact: Elephants can recognize themselves in a mirror.

animals.name: Parrot
animals.funFact: Parrots can live for more than 50 years.

animals.name: Snake
animals.funFact: Snakes smell with their tongues.

animals.name: Frog
animals.funFact: Frogs can breathe through their skin.

animals.name: Jaguar
animals.funFact: Jaguars are strong swimmers and love water.

animals.name: Toucan
animals.funFact: A toucanâ€™s big beak helps keep it cool.

animals.name: Sloth
animals.funFact: Sloths move so slowly that algae can grow on their fur.

animals.name: Crocodile
animals.funFact: Crocodiles have the strongest bite of any animal.

animals.name: Chimpanzee
animals.funFact: Chimpanzees can learn sign language.

animals.name: Black Panther
animals.funFact: Black panthers are big cats with dark fur.

animals.name: Bat
animals.funFact: Bats use sound to find their way in the dark.

animals.name: Lizard
animals.funFact: Some lizards can drop their tail to escape danger.

animals.name: Orangutan
animals.funFact: Orangutans spend most of their life in trees.

animals.name: Boa Snake
animals.funFact: Boa snakes squeeze their prey instead of using poison.

animals.name: Anteater
animals.funFact: Anteaters have long tongues to eat ants.

animals.name: Poison Frog
animals.funFact: Some poison frogs are very bright to warn predators.

animals.name: Tapir
animals.funFact: Tapirs look like pigs with a short trunk.

animals.funFact: Macaw parrots use strong beaks to crack hard nuts.

animals.name: Dolphin
animals.funFact: Dolphins are very intelligent and can recognize themselves in mirrors.

animals.name: Shark
animals.funFact: Sharks have been around for over 400 million years.

animals.name: Octopus
animals.funFact: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.

animals.funFact: Sea turtles can live for more than 100 years.

animals.name: Jellyfish
animals.funFact: Some jellyfish are biologically immortal.

animals.name: Clownfish
animals.funFact: Clownfish can change sex depending on the colony.

animals.name: Seahorse
animals.funFact: Male seahorses carry the babies.

animals.name: Starfish
animals.funFact: Starfish can regrow lost arms.

animals.name: Crab
animals.funFact: Crabs walk sideways and have strong pincers.

animals.name: Lobster
animals.funFact: Lobsters can live over 50 years.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.funFact: Penguins are birds but cannot fly.

animals.name: Whale
animals.funFact: Blue whales are the largest animals on Earth.

animals.name: Seal
animals.funFact: Seals can hold their breath for over 20 minutes.

animals.name: Swordfish
animals.funFact: Swordfish can swim at speeds up to 60 km/h.

animals.name: Angelfish
animals.funFact: Angelfish are brightly colored and popular in aquariums.

animals.name: Moray Eel
animals.funFact: Moray eels have sharp teeth and hide in crevices.

animals.name: Sea Lion
animals.funFact: Sea lions are playful and social animals.

animals.name: Coral
animals.funFact: Corals are animals that build reefs with calcium carbonate.

animals.name: Manta Ray
animals.funFact: Manta rays can have a wingspan of 7 meters.

animals.name: Hermit Crab
animals.funFact: Hermit crabs use empty shells to protect their soft bodies.

animals.name: T-Rex
animals.funFact: Tyrannosaurus rex had the strongest bite of any land animal.

animals.name: Triceratops
animals.funFact: Triceratops had three horns and a bony frill for defense.

animals.name: Velociraptor
animals.funFact: Velociraptors were feathered and fast hunters.

animals.name: Brachiosaurus
animals.funFact: Brachiosaurus had a long neck to reach tall trees.

animals.name: Stegosaurus
animals.funFact: Stegosaurus had plates on its back for protection.

animals.name: Pterodactyl
animals.funFact: Pterodactyls could fly using their winged arms.

animals.name: Ankylosaurus
animals.funFact: Ankylosaurus had a club-like tail for defense.

animals.name: Spinosaurus
animals.funFact: Spinosaurus was one of the largest carnivorous dinosaurs.

animals.name: Allosaurus
animals.funFact: Allosaurus hunted in packs and was very agile.

animals.name: Diplodocus
animals.funFact: Diplodocus had a whip-like tail and a very long neck.

animals.name: Iguanodon
animals.funFact: Iguanodons had large thumb spikes for defense.

animals.name: Parasaurolophus
animals.funFact: They had a long curved crest for making sounds.

animals.name: Carnotaurus
animals.funFact: Carnotaurus had small arms and two horns above its eyes.

animals.name: Coelophysis
animals.funFact: Coelophysis was one of the earliest known dinosaurs.

animals.name: Pachycephalosaurus
animals.funFact: They had thick domed skulls used for head-butting.

animals.name: Megalosaurus
animals.funFact: Megalosaurus was the first dinosaur ever described scientifically.

animals.name: Therizinosaurus
animals.funFact: Therizinosaurus had huge claws up to a meter long.

animals.name: Sauropelta

animals.name: Dilophosaurus
animals.funFact: Dilophosaurus had a crest on its head and could run fast.

animals.name: Compsognathus

animals.name: Chicken
